SummaryEnglish: Seiran Island, a tropical eden where people are free to act on their desires under a uniquely libertine law. But even here in paradise, there are those who work in the shadows to bring it down… United, these misfits stand side by side as the secret society NLNS. As their founder and head honcho, I, Junnosuke Tachibana,won’t stop until we’ve crushed this crazy law once and for all! I’ve even found a benefactor in this crusty old rich guy, name unknown… He’s hooked us up with a secret base and a buttload of cash already. In return, he wants us to find someone and “protect her at all costs.” Apparently, she holds the key to our mission’s success…? In this case, there’s only one thing to do: locate this mystery girl. And all while keeping the SHO off our scent, too…

5.SummaryEnglish: It’s been decided—Governor Hitoura will be giving a speech at Lewd Land. Determined to take him down, Fumino heads there with Misaki at her side. 6.SummaryEnglish: The NLNS succeeds in saving Fumino and Misaki, but at a huge sacrifice. Junnosuke has lost his virginity forever... That's not to say he had pervert sex with the love of his life! 8.SummaryEnglish: After developing a soft spot for the Future SHO, Junnosuke aborts the operation, and they fail to hand over Fumino to their benefactor by the end of Cumming-Of-Age Day. Although it looked as if they were evenly matched, Junnosuke gets immobilized by Touka's secret weapon! Meanwhile, Fumino, holding a messenger captive, has a negotiation with her archenemy, Hitoura.
